summary.span: 将 （或可以强制转换为 的对象）转换为指定类型。

span.span: Converts an (or an object that can be cast to an ) to the specified type.

returns.span: 此方法返回转换后的对象。

span.span: This method returns the converted object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最常见的类型转换是与字符串类型。The most common type conversion is to and from a string type. 默认实现将调用对象方法的对象是否有效且目标类型为字符串。The default implementation calls the method of the object if the object is valid and if the destination type is string. 如果此方法不能将指定的对象转换为目标类型，则会引发异常。If this method cannot convert the specified object to the destination type, it throws a exception.

span.span: The conversion cannot be completed.

span.span: If no properties should be exposed, this can return .
The default implementation always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，类型不返回任何属性。By default, a type does not return any properties. 此方法的简单实现调用为正确的数据类型的方法。An easy implementation of this method calls the method for the correct data type.
